 57 -def fetch_file(url, proxy=None): 

 58      ''' 
 59      Download file by URL 
 60   
 61      @param url: URL of a file 
 62      @type url: string 
 63   
 64      @param proxy: URL of HTTP Proxy 
 65      @type proxy: string 
 66   
 67      @return: File 
 68      @rtype: string 
 69   
 70      ''' 
 71      if not url.startswith('http://') and not url.startswith('ftp://'): 
 72          try: 
 73              return open(url, 'r').read() 
 74          except IOError, errmsg: 
 75              LOG.error(errmsg) 
 76              return '' 
 77      LOG.debug('Fetching ' + url) 
 78      if proxy: 
 79          opener = build_opener(ProxyHandler({'http': proxy})) 
 80      else: 
 81          opener = build_opener() 
 82      opener.addheaders = [('Accept', 'application/rdf+xml'), 
 83              ('User-agent', 
 84               'Mozilla/5.0 (compatible; ternate ' + 
 85               'http://trac.assembla.com/ternate)')] 
 86      try: 
 87          result = opener.open(url) 
 88      except HTTPError, err_msg: 
 89          if err_msg.code == 404: 
 90              raise NotFoundError('Not found: %s' % url) 
 91          else: 
 92              LOG.error(err_msg) 
 93              return 
 94      except URLError, err_msg: 
 95          LOG.error(err_msg) 
 96          return 
 97      return result.read()
